START.error_critical:

Sicela uzame futhi noma uxhumane nokwesekwa.
START.error_send_welcome: âŒ Iphutha ekuthumeleni umlayezo wamukelekile. Sicela uzame futhi noma uxhumane nokwesekwa.
START.new_user_description: Sawubona {username}! Umhumushi wakho uqinisekile futhi usukulungele ukusetshenziswa.
START.getting_started_value:
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/daily` ukuthola amaphuzu nsuku zonke
â€¢ Zama `/texttr` ngomhumusho wakho wokuqala
â€¢ Hlola `/shop` ukuthola ukuthuthukiswa kwesikhashana
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/help` ukuthola imiyalo eningiliziwe
START.admin_tips_value:
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/setchannel` ukulinganisa ukuhumusha eziteshini ezithile/izilimi
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/invite` ukwengeza i-Muse kwamanye amaseva
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/help` ukuthola yonke imiyalo
START.voice_commands_value:
`/voicechat [source] [target]` - Ukuhumusha kwezwi ngesikhathi sangempela
`/voicechat2 [lang1] [lang2]` - Ukuhumusha okuqhubekayo okuhlangene
`/voice [text] [source] [target]` - Ukuhumusha wombhalo uye ezwini
`/speak [text] [source] [target]` - Humusha bese udlala esiteshini sezwi
START.text_commands_value:
`/texttr [text] [source] [target]` - Humusha umbhalo
`/autotranslate [source] [target]` - Humusha ngokuzenzakalelayo yonke imilayezo yakho
`/read [message_id] [target]` - Humusha noma yimuphi umlayezo othunyelwe nge-ID
`/dmtr [user] [text] [source] [target]` - Thumela umlayezo ohunyushiwe ku-DM
START.achievements_value:
`/achievements` - Buka inqubekelaphambili yakho yemiklomelo
`/rewards` - Hlola amaphuzu nesikhundla sakho
`/cashout` - Guqula amaphuzu emiklomelo abe ngamaphuzu okusebenza
`/daily` - Thola amaphuzu ansuku zonke
`/shop` - Buka isitolo samaphuzu
`/buy [item]` - Thenga izinto esitolo
`/buypoints [amount]` - Thenga amaphuzu angeziwe
`/gift [amount]` - Nikeza abangani amaphuzu
`/profile` - Buka iphrofayela yakho
`/leaderboard` - Bona abasebenzisi abaphezulu
`/transactions` - Buka umlando wokuhweba ngamaphuzu
START.settings_value:
`/hide` noma `/show` - Fihla noma ubonise umbhalo wokuqala
`/preferences` - Lungisa izilimi ozithandayo
`/history` - Buka umlando wokuhumusha
`/list` - Bona zonke izilimi ezisekelwayo
`/upgrade` - Vula izici ezikhethekile
`/help` - Uhlu oluphelele lwemiyalo
`/stop` - Misa iseshini yokuhumusha
START.community_value:
`/feedback` - Nikeza umlinganiselo nemibono (thola amaphuzu!)
`/reviews` - Bona okushiwo abanye abasebenzisi
`/invite` - Yabelana ngo-Muse nabangani (thola amaphuzu!)
`/vote` - Sekela i-bot ezindaweni zokuvota (thola amaphuzu!)
START.upgrade_benefits_value:
ğŸ¥‰ **Basic ($1/ngenyanga):** 500 izinhlamvu, 1h yezwi, ukufinyelela emlandweni
ğŸ¥ˆ **Premium ($3/ngenyanga):** 2000 izinhlamvu, 2h yezwi, ukuqhubeka okubalulekile
ğŸ¥‡ **Pro ($5/ngenyanga):** Konke okungenamkhawulo + izici ze-beta
START.premium_active_value:
â€¢ Imingcele ethuthukisiwe: {text_limit} izinhlamvu
â€¢ Isikhathi sezwi: {voice_limit} imizuzu
â€¢ Isiphindaphindo samaphuzu: {multiplier}
â€¢ Siyabonga ngokweseka i-Muse! ğŸ’–
START.language_format_value:
Ungasebenzisa amagama ezilimi noma amakhodi:
â€¢ Amagama: `English`, `Spanish`, `Japanese`
â€¢ Amakhodi: `en`, `es`, `ja`
â€¢ Isibonelo: `/texttr text:'Hello World' source_lang:English target_lang:Spanish`

4. Thola ukufinyelela ngokushesha!

BUYPOINTS.title: ğŸ’ Thenga Amaphuzu (Ukuthenga Okukodwa)

ğŸ’µ **$3** = amaphuzu angama-180 *(ibhonasi engu-20%)*

**I-Premium:** $1/ngenyanga ukubhalisa, konke okungenamkhawulo
BUYPOINTS.how_value:
1. Chofoza inkinobho ye-Ko-fi engezansi
2. Yenza **donasiyo eyodwa kuphela** (hhayi ukubhalisa)
3. Faka i-ID yakho ye-Discord: `{user_id}`
4. Amaphuzu angezwa ngokushesha!

HELP.title: ğŸ¤– Muse Umhumushi - Uhlu Lwemiyalo
HELP.reward_value:
`/daily` - Thola umvuzo wakho wansuku zonke
`/shop` - Buka isitolo semivuzo
`/buy [umvuzo]` - Thenga imivuzo usebenzisa amaphoyinti
`/profile [umsebenzisi]` - Buka iphrofayela yakho nezibalo
`/rewards` - Buka imivuzo yakho esebenzayo
`/gift [umsebenzisi] [inani]` - Nikeza amaphoyinti kwabanye
HELP.social_value:
`/leaderboard` - Buka abasebenzisi abaphezulu ngamaphoyinti
`/achievements` - Buka izimpumelelo nezimpawu
`/cashout` - Shintsha amaphoyinti ezimpumelelo esitolo `/shop`
`/transactions` - Buka umlando wokuhweba kwamaphoyinti akho
HELP.setup_value_user: `/stop` - Misa noma yiziphi izikhathi zokuhumusha ezisebenzayo
HELP.setup_value_admin:
`/setchannel [i-ID_yesiteshi]` - Setha isiteshi sokuhumusha namalungelo olimi
`/stop` - Misa noma yiziphi izikhathi zokuhumusha ezisebenzayo
HELP.settings_value:
`/hide` - Fihla umlayezo wokuqala ekuhumusheni
`/show` - Bonisa umlayezo wokuqala ekuhumusheni
`/preferences` - Hlela izilimi zakho eziyizintandokazi
`/history` - Buka umlando wokuhumusha kwakho
HELP.info_value:
`/list` - Buka zonke izilimi ezisekelwayo
`/upgrade` - Buka izinketho eziphambili
`/invite` - Thola izixhumanisi zokumema ibhothi
`/vote` - Thola izixhumanisi zokuvota ibhothi
`/help` - Khombisa lolu hlu lwemiyalo
HELP.readimage_value: `/readimage [ulimi_olufunwayo]` - Khipha bese uhunyushwa umbhalo wezithombe usebenzisa i-OCR
HELP.context_value: `Chofoza kwesokudla umlayezo â†’ Izinhlelo â†’ Funda umlayezo` - Humusha noma yimuphi umlayezo
HELP.tips_value:
â€¢ Sebenzisa `auto` ukuthola ulimi ngokuzenzakalelayo
â€¢ Amakhodi ezilimi: `en`, `es`, `fr` noma amagama: English, Spanish, French
â€¢ Thola amaphoyinti nsuku zonke futhi uthenge amalungelo wesikhashana!
â€¢ Isibonelo: `/texttr text:'hola' source_lang:es target_lang:en`
HELP.footer_server: Imodi yesiphakeli: {server} | Zonke izici ziyatholakala | Sebenzisa `/daily` ukuthola amaphoyinti!
HELP.footer_dm: Imodi yomsebenzisi: Okungcono ku-DM | Ezinye izici zikhona kuphela ku-server | Sebenzisa `/daily` ukuthola amaphoyinti!

2. **Chofoza Ngokudla Kwelungelo** kumlayezo ofuna ukuhumusha
